content: What's up, Maria? Long time no see!
Hey Alex, nice to see you too! How are you doing today?
Hi Maria! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How about you? Have you thought about securing your future with a life insurance plan lately?
Yeah, I've been thinking about it, but honestly, the dating scene is so draining these days; I just want to focus on myself for now.

Absolutely, self-care is important. And that's why our "SeF-for-Life" policy is perfect – it's designed to empower you, providing financial security while you focus on your personal growth. It's an investment in your future self. Would you like to know more?
Hmm, maybe later. Right now, I'm still giving my parents allowances since they're dependent on me. Plus, I'd love to have kids someday, but I'm worried about the costs involved.

That's a thoughtful approach, Maria. Our policy can actually help with that. It offers flexibility to cover your current dependents and can be adjusted as your family grows, ensuring financial support for your future kids too. When you're ready, we can discuss how it aligns with your priorities.
Okay, that does sound interesting. But for now, I'm really tight on my budget. As a marketing manager at FWD, my salary isn't enough to spend much on insurance.

I understand, Maria. Our plans are designed to be affordable and adaptable. We have options that can fit into different budgets. Maybe a quick chat about your financials can help us find a suitable plan for you, without adding stress to your finances. No pressure, just exploring options.
Alright, I suppose it won't hurt to explore. Pero, let’s make this quick. I have a date tonight and I need to get ready.

Of course, I'll be brief. I'll send you a link with some basic information about our flexible plans. Take a look when you have a moment, and feel free to ask any questions. Enjoy your date tonight, Maria! Fingers crossed for you.
Thanks, Alex. You’re a lifesaver! Just hope hindi sayang yung coverage kasi I’m not married or have kids yet.

Not at all, Maria. Our policies are designed to be valuable at every stage of life. They include personal benefits too, like health coverage and investment growth, so it's never too early to start. Enjoy your evening, and remember, it's about investing in yourself first. You're on the right track!
You know, you kinda made me think. Investing in myself sounds pretty good. Siguro I should consider it more seriously.

I'm glad to hear that, Maria! Taking care of your future is a wonderful form of self-care. When you're ready to dive deeper, I'm here. In the meantime, take your time and enjoy the journey. Every small step counts. Have a fantastic day!
Thanks, Alex. You’ve been very helpful. I’ll definitely check out that link later. See you around!
You're welcome, Maria! Feel free to reach out anytime. Have a great day and enjoy every moment. See you around!
Will do, Alex. Take care!
You too, Maria. Take care and have a wonderful time!
You're welcome, Alex. Have a great day!
Thank you, Maria! Wishing you a fantastic day as well. Don't hesitate if you have more questions. Take care!
